Text:
Hi dohduhdah! Thanx again for the math tutor courses. Most useful and i have made great progress so far. There seem to be a lot of TTC-videos althought i havent found Transformational Leadership anywhere yet, and though the math tutor complete collection is pretty large, it seem to not cover every course on mathtutordvd, ok! I get that there always comes new courses like calculus 1: derivatives, someone seem to have asked for pre-algebra too, although myself am able to cope with my algebra, other people may have difficulties.

Well... I request. If you can find:
TTC - Transformational Leadership

and

Math Tutor DVD Calculus 1: Extra Practice with Derivatives

It would be most helpful for me.
Keep up the good work! And lets seed for every peoples that are hungry for knowledge...

@raenkae

Sorry, can't find "TTC - Transformational Leadership" yet.

Oh. Maybe its too new.. It is among their courses. The full title is 
Transformational Leadership: How Leaders Change Teams, Companies, and Organizations 

Well. Time will tell if it arrives. Would need a leadership-course.
Thanks. All Math Tutor lectures are highly welcome for one in my situation.
New TTC courses tend to show up on the familiar torrent sites sooner or later. :-)

Thank you so much for these great courses!
If I could make a request it would be TTC Video - Origin of Civilization Taught By Professor Scott MacEachern. http://www.thegreatcourses.com/tgc/courses/course_detail.aspx?cid=3130
God bless!
